objects.name: Analytic 0429
objects.description: Detection of suspicious write operations to block devices, modifications of bootloader files (GRUB, initrd, vmlinuz), and unexpected changes within the EFI System Partition. Monitors privileged execution of utilities like dd, grub-install, or efibootmgr that modify boot sectors or loader entries.
